short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically apply blur effects to specified selectors on configured pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps you with your marketing and promotional materials by making it easy to blur out or sensitive data in your product/results. Create rulesets to blur or remove sensitive data and share it with your team. Use the select similar elements feature to easily add new rules and toggle blurring on and off. The import and export feature means that only one person on your team needs to create the rules. Show off that wow factor for your product! Made with <3 by the RivalFlow AI team.
